note: "Every Smoker is an Embodiment of Prometheus, stealing Fire from the Gods and Bringing it on Back Home. We Smoke to Capture the Power of the Sun, to Pacify Hell, to Identify with the Primordial Spark, to Feed on them Arrow of the Volcano. It's not the Tobacco we're After but the Fire. When we Smoke, we are Performing a Version of the Fire Dance, a Ritual as Ancient as Lightning."
